title: The White Song
description: The hour of reckoning is at hand. The skies darken with the forces of the enemy while the hopes of the armies of the light dwindle to but a candle flame. Morals, compunctions, oaths - all must be set aside, every sacrifice made, every advantage and ally sought if there is to be any chance for survival.The White Song is the final installment in the fantasy series, Chronicles of the Black Gate.
author: Phil Tucker
